thread.title: Turkish Airlines introduces new route to Tajikistan
thread.title_full: Turkish Airlines introduces new route to Tajikistan

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Turkish Airlines introduces new route to Tajikistan
text:
Turkish Airlines introduces new route to Tajikistan Turkish Airlines introduces new route to Tajikistan Details Category: Airport & Airline   15:30 Turkish Airlines, ranked the “Best Airline in Europe”* for the fifth consecutive year, adds another route to its Far East network.Today, the second-largest city of Tajikistan and the capital of the northernmost province of this country, Khujand joined the network as the 34th destination served in the Far East. 
Beginning from today, flights to Khujand will be operated two times per week on Mondays and Thursdays, and on Tuesdays, and Fridays from Khujand. Related articles
